description: The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement to purchase one (1) NARDA SRM-3006 Selective Radiation Meter.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement
ACAN-Radiation Meter
================================================================{}
**Title**
[Canadian] Radiation Meter
**Reference Number**
WS4412523427-Doc4412639750

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Publication Date**
2024-01-25

**Tender Closing Date**
2024-02-12 02:00:00 PM ET

**Expected Contract Start Date**
2024-02-26

**Expected Contract End Date**
None

**Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **UNSPSC Code**: 32131000 (Electronic component parts and raw materials and accessories)

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
**Phone**: Not Available
**Email**: [steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18621145?extsite=MTg2MjExNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Brief Description**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires a Radiation Meter to be purchased in support of a specific project. A single NARDA SRM-3006 Selective Radiation Meter is needed to meet this requirement.

**Trade Agreements**
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

This tender announcement provides all the necessary details for contractors to take part. Keep in mind that the tender status is expired, which means that this opportunity for contractors is no longer possible. Nevertheless, this announcement remains useful for documenting the procurement process.  The Government of Canada and the public can view details of this and other tenders through the  Government constract to Analytics Tanelender database. End of analysis, being a technical writer, any customization to outputs based on the customer's need should be considered. 
Note- The previous text provided had no useful data to fill the answering output based on what was required.
